events.name: Shreveport-Bossier Startup Weekend
events.about:
The Shreveport Bossier Startup Weekend event will be held on Oct 26-28, 2012 inside of Shreveports coworking space Cohabat 610 Commerce Street. Cohab is situated within walking distance of the downtown area, casinos, the red river and is just across the river from the Louisiana Boardwalk in Bossier City. The area is heart of the creativity in Northwest Louisiana and is teeming with history and fun things to do. 

The Shreveport Bossier Startup Weekend consists of dozens of entrepreneurs being coached by nearly 40 well established business and industry leaders in the surrounding region. The list of committed judges and coaches are growing every day, check back weekly as our list of participants grows. 

If you are an entrepreneur or have an idea for a business and want to pitch it, press the Register link above to get involved. Read the Startup Weekend FAQ to get answers to most of your questions. 

We are looking forward to you joining us!
